DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety Tolerability Well Absorption Excretion TC-5214 Medically Stable Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Medically stable male female subject age great equal 65 year suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture . Subjects may control chronic disease hypertension , type 2 diabetes , osteoarthritis , stable chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , mild moderate renal insufficiency ( Estimated glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) per Modified Diet Renal Disease [ MDRD ] formula > 50 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) , rhinitis etc . long significant change medical condition medication precede 6 week . Classification renal impairment base use MDRD equation Male subject sexually active must use condom partner childbearing potential must use reliable method contraception first dose investigational product 3 month last dose Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 32 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg History clinically significant medical , neurologic psychiatric disease disorder ( previously define acceptable population , see inclusion criterion 1 ) , opinion Investigator , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study : This include seizure activity repeat episode major depression Significant cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease : history acute coronary syndrome ; angina symptomatic last 6 month ; significant symptomatic arrhythmia ; stroke ; transient ischemic attack occur last 6 month History presence gastrointestinal hepatic disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug Subjects type 2 diabetes must HbA1c le 8 % accord National Glycohemoglobin Standardization Program ( NGSP ) screen Significant renal insufficiency define eGFR per MDRD formula < 50 mL/min/1.73 m2 ( individual eGFR measurement document protocol ) .
